mapper.select:
SELECT U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, M.MAIN_SUBJECT AS MAIN_SUBJECT, M.ENROLLED_AT AS ENROLLED_AT, T.TASK_STATUS_VALUE AS TASK_STATUS_VALUE, M.VIEW_CNT AS VIEW_CNT, COUNT(R.REPLY_ID) AS REPLY_CNT, C.CATEGORY_NM AS CATEGORY_NM, M.MAIN_TASK_ID AS MAIN_TASK_ID FROM MAIN_TASK M JOIN TASK_STATUS T ON M.TASK_STATUS_ID = T.TASK_STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN REPLY R ON M.MAIN_TASK_ID = R.MAIN_TASK_ID JOIN CATEGORY C ON M.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID JOIN USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
M.MAIN_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND C.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
GROUP BY U.NICKNAME, M.MAIN_SUBJECT, M.ENROLLED_AT, T.TASK_STATUS_VALUE, M.VIEW_CNT, C.CATEGORY_NM, M.MAIN_TASK_ID ORDER BY M.ENROLLED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIN_TASK (USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID, MAIN_SUBJECT, START_TIMESTAMP, END_TIMESTAMP, MEMO, TASK_STATUS_ID) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{mainSubject}, #{startTimestamp}, #{endTimestamp}, #{memo}, #{taskStatusId})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MAIN_TASK_ID AS MAIN_TASK_ID, M.USER_ID AS USER_ID, C.CATEGORY_NM AS CATEGORY_NM, M.MAIN_SUBJECT AS MAIN_SUBJECT, M.START_TIMESTAMP AS START_TIMESTAMP, M.END_TIMESTAMP AS END_TIMESTAMP, M.MEMO AS MEMO, M.ENROLLED_AT AS ENROLLED_AT, M.MODIFIED_AT AS MODIFIED_AT, T.TASK_STATUS_VALUE AS TASK_STATUS_VALUE, M.VIEW_CNT AS VIEW_CNT, U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM MAIN_TASK M JOIN CATEGORY C ON M.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID JOIN TASK_STATUS T ON M.TASK_STATUS_ID = T.TASK_STATUS_ID JOIN USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE M.MAIN_TASK_ID = #{mainTaskId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_TASK SET CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, MAIN_SUBJECT = #{mainSubject}, START_TIMESTAMP = #{startTimestamp}, END_TIMESTAMP = #{endTimestamp}, MEMO = #{memo}, MODIFIED_AT = NOW() WHERE MAIN_TASK_ID = #{mainTaskId}
